abstract: A number of  technology advances will be announced, including an initiative that could give rise to a new class of wireless hand-held computers.
snippet: A number of  technology advances will be announced, including an initiative that could give rise to a new class of wireless hand-held computers.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, April 15 — Intel is planning to announce a number of technology advances this week at a conference in Beijing, including an initiative that could give rise to a new class of wireless hand-held computers, according to several people close to the efforts.

headline.main: Intel Seen Using China Forum to Detail Plans on Hand-Helds
headline.print_headline: Intel Seen Using China Forum To Detail Plans on Hand-Helds
